text: “Brrda phu sraththa thanghlay! Thæcring brrda mu chri knan somm dangnan phwk khea cng xya khea kıl xal-masyidil ha rxm hlangcak pi khxng phwk khea ni læa hak phwk cea klaw khwam yakcn xallxh k ca thrng hı phwk cea mangmi cak khwam kruna khxng phraxngkh hak phraxngkh thrng prasngkh thæ cring xallxh pen phuthrng rxbru phuthrng pricha yan”
